data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Danielle: Hey there! I'll ____ a ____ sandwich ____ wheat ____, ____.
Employee: Sure ____! Would ____ like ____ or ____ on ____?
Danielle: Hmm, I'll ____ some ____, ____ no ____ please.
Employee: I'll have it ready for you in 5 minutes.
data.partBlankContent:
Danielle: Hey there! I'll ta__ a tur___ sandwich o_ wheat br___, ple___.
Employee: Sure th___! Would y__ like let____ or pic___ on th__?
Danielle: Hmm, I'll ta__ some let____, b__ no pic___ please.
Employee: I'll have it ready for you in 5 minutes.
data.fullContent: Danielle: Hey there! I'll take a turkey sandwich on wheat bread, please. Employee: Sure thing! Would you like lettuce or pickle on that? Danielle: Hmm, I'll take some lettuce, but no pickle please. Employee: I'll have it ready for you in 5 minutes.
data.answer: 丹尼尔:嘿!我要一个小麦面包的火鸡三明治。 职员:没问题!您要加生菜还是腌黄瓜? 丹尼尔:嗯，我要一些生菜，但是不要腌黄瓜。 职员:我5分钟内为您准备好。
